Neutralization:
"the deviant behavior can be justified as good"
Lowry, P. B.

In a research, the relationship between neutralization and posting malicious comments on social media was studied and have proved that neutralization makes users post more hate comments. Thus, people who get neutralized easily have higher possibility of posting malicious comments. Gender and lack of attention are also related to neutralization and posting malicious comments.
